summary: In Santa Fe de Tierra Firme, an imaginary Latin American country, the indigenous dictator Santos Banderas rules with an iron fist. A group of rebels trying to seize power by force while some liberals try a change of government legally.
cast: Gian Maria Volontè|Ana Belén|Juan Diego|Ignacio López Tarso|Javier Gurruchaga|Fernando Guillén|Patricio Contreras|Enrique San Francisco|Gabriela Roel|Manuel Bandera|Daisy Granados|Omar Valdés|Samuel Claxton|René de la Cruz|Sara Mora|Guillán Vargas|Francis Lorenzo|María Galiana|Patricio Wood|Jorge Luis Álvarez|Alejandro Lugo|Aaron Vega|Jorge Losada|Santiago Mato|Nelson González|Adela Legrá|Elio Martín|Lázaro Núñez|Juan Acosta|Arcadio Sosa|Carlos Calero|Tania Ceballos|Emilio Marill|Héctor Pérez|Pedro Silva|Jessa García
title: Tirano Banderas
